maqras.text: But We cast him, ill, on an open shore
and We made a gourd vine to grow over him
and We sent him to a hundred thousand people or more
They believed, so We let them enjoy their life
So [Prophet] inquire [of the idolaters], "Why do they think their Lord has daughters while they have sons
Or, maybe they witnessed the creation of the angels as females
No indeed, It is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say
God has begotten," and they are liars
Has He chosen daughters over sons
What is [wrong] with you? How do you reach your judgments
Will you not be reminded [of the warning against such thinking]
Or do you have a clear authority [for what you allege]
Then, produce your Book, if you are truthful
They also claimed a lineage between Him and the jinn, but the jinn know that they will be brought before Him for [judgment]
May God be exalted in His glory above all they describe
except for God's devout worshipers [who don't make such claims]
So you [who deny the truth] and whatever you worship
cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
except for him who will burn in Hell
[All of God's creations will say], "Among us, too, there is none but has a known place
We are ranged in ranks
and we are those who glorify God
The unbelievers used to say
If only we had a message from those who lived before us
we would have been faithful worshipers of God
But they rejected the message, so they will soon realize [the consequences]
Our word has already been given to Our worshiping Messengers
[that] they would indeed be victorious
and [that] Our soldiers will be those who overcome
So [Prophet], leave them for a time
And watch them, for they will soon see
Do they really want to hasten Our punishment
When it descends on them, how terrible will that morning be for those who were warned
Leave them for a time
and watch them, for they will soon see
May your Lord, the Lord of Might, be exalted in His glory above all they describe
And Peace be on the Messengers
and praise be to God, Lord of the worlds
Saad, by the Qur'an, which contains all that one ought to know
The unbelievers are full of arrogance and dissent
How many generations have We destroyed before them (for the same sins)? They called out (to Us), but it was too late to escape
They are surprised that one of their own has come out to warn them, so those who want to deny the truth are saying, "This is a magician and a liar
How can he claim that the gods are [only] one God? This is a strange thing
Their leaders went off, saying, "Walk away, and be faithful to your gods. This is what you must do
We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This must be an invention
How can the message be revealed to him alone out of all of us?"In fact, they are in doubt about My message. In fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment
Or do They have the stores of your Lord's mercy, the Almighty, the Ever-Giving
Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens, and the earth, and what is between them? Then let them ascend through any means of access
[They are only] soldiers [who will be] defeated regardless of what alliance they have
The people of Noah denied [My messages] before them, as did [the tribe of] Aad, Pharaoh-the owner of [many] tent-poles
[the tribe of] Thamud, the people of Lot, the woods-dwellers: those were the parties
each of whom rejected the messengers, so My punishment was justified
And these, too, [who now deny the truth] are only awaiting a single blast, which will not be stopped
And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account
Be patient over what they say, and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Us]
We subjected the mountains to join him in praising Our limitless glory in the evening and daybreak
and the birds to assemble, all repeating [praises] with him
And We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and keen judgment
